EmailTemplate.name: Change of PhD Program
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of PhD Program - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
I am pleased to advise you that you have now been transferred from Translational Research PhD Program to Public Health and Preventative Medicine PhD Program.
Please contact the new program coordinator or administrator directly for more information about the program.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
